paramInformation.label: Time Interval Based Switch Status Reporting

metadata.inclusion: Press and hold the button for 4 to 7 seconds, then release. The LED flashes twice per second during the process and turns off when successful.
metadata.exclusion: Press and hold the button for 4 to 7 seconds, then release. The LED flashes once per second when successful.
metadata.reset: Power cycle the device, then press and hold the button for 7-11 seconds within 60 seconds of power cycle.
